title: Animal Husbandry Game-Based Learning Module

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Learners must participate in real-time video classes and engage in simple creation activities required for game-based tasks using personal devices

learning_goals: Explain biological characteristics according to animal reproductive methods (oviparous/viviparous) with over 80% accuracy
Achieve 90% participation in classifying animal reproductive methods through gamification activities
Apply at least three ecological principles in a virtual farm management game incorporating animal husbandry methods
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
